name: The Eerie Inn
description: The Eerie Inn is a mystery, puzzle-solving horror game with a strong emphasis on the narrative. You play as one of the girls staying at a guest house and your mission is to find out the truth behind the mysterious things happening there. You will soon realize that things aren't what they appear to be..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 5th Gen or Equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB GeForce GTX 650 or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
